author: courant.com
title: Girls Soccer: RHAM Vs. Berlin
text:
Caption Girls Soccer: RHAM Vs. Berlin Michael McAndrews Berlin's Grace McCann controls the ball while RHAM's Gretchen Kron follows in the first half. RHAM went on to win, 2-1.
Berlin's Grace McCann controls the ball while RHAM's Gretchen Kron follows in the first half. RHAM went on to win, 2-1.
(Michael McAndrews) Girls Soccer: RHAM Vs. Berlin Michael McAndrews Berlin's Sarah Daddario and RHAM's Caleigh O'Commor fight for control of the ball in the second half of play in Hebron Monday. RHAM went on to win, 2-1.
Berlin's Sarah Daddario and RHAM's Caleigh O'Commor fight for control of the ball in the second half of play in Hebron Monday. RHAM went on to win, 2-1.
(Michael McAndrews) See more galleries RHAM beat Berlin 2-1 in girls soccer in at RHAM High School in Hebron Monday.
Michael McAndrews
